ISSUE.TITLE: Cannot delete dashboard from home page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: On the home page, clicking the "X" next to a dashboard brings up the "are you sure" alert, but clicking OK results in the dashboard not being deleted. The title disappears, but if you reload the page the dashboard is still there. Version 0.7.1+b1015

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #537 from ekampf/patch-3 Docs: Missing --source-uri in command

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix #541: archived dashboards appear in recent list.
Fix #541: archived dashboards appear in recent list.
